project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that fetches current weather information for a specified city using a public API and displays temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Set up the project environment and initialize a main Python file
Implement functionality to make an API call to a public weather service
Parse the JSON response from the API to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement display logic to show the extracted weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the API call, response parsing, and display functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
